document.full_text: nato will enforce the arms and mercenaries blockade on libya "robustly," with force if needed, and hopes more nations will join those who have committed ships, planes and submarines, the operation head said on thursday.
document.title: nato vows to enforce libya embargo "robustly"
lines_and_colors: nato will enforce the arms and mercenaries blockade on libya "robustly," with force if needed, and hopes more nations will join those who have committed ships, planes and submarines, the operation head said on thursday.
